001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.format;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter;
004
005/**
006 * A <strong>TTLL</strong> formatter that has the layout of <strong>TTLL - Time, Thread,
007 * Level, Logger</strong> but allows changing the format of time, thread, level, logger,
008 * etc.
009 */
010public final class StandardEventFormatter extends AbstractStandardEventFormatter {
011
012        StandardEventFormatter( //
013                        LogFormatter timestampFormatter, //
014                        LogFormatter threadFormatter, //
015                        LogFormatter levelFormatter, //
016                        LogFormatter nameFormatter, //
017                        LogFormatter messageFormatter, //
018                        LogFormatter throwableFormatter, //
019                        LogFormatter keyValuesFormatter) {
020                super(timestampFormatter, threadFormatter, levelFormatter, nameFormatter, messageFormatter, throwableFormatter,
021                                keyValuesFormatter);
022        }
023
024        /**
025         * Create {@link StandardEventFormatter} builder.
026         * @return builder.
027         */
028        public static Builder builder() {
029                return new Builder();
030        }
031
032        /**
033         * Builder for {@link StandardEventFormatter} aka TTLL formatter.
034         */
035        public static final class Builder extends AbstractBuilder<Builder> {
036
037                private Builder() {
038                        super();
039                }
040
041                @Override
042                protected Builder self() {
043                        return this;
044                }
045
046                /**
047                 * Builds the formatter.
048                 * @return formatter.
049                 */
050                public StandardEventFormatter build() {
051                        return new StandardEventFormatter(timestampFormatter, threadFormatter, levelFormatter, nameFormatter,
052                                        messageFormatter, throwableFormatter, keyValuesFormatter);
053                }
054
055        }
056
057}
